name: Cube Cave (Señor T)
description:
✦ CUBE GAME: Spawn into a procedurally generated tile world, destroy anything and everything, and make millions! Buy new picks, mine equipment, and more from the shop keeper! ==============================================

DIRECTIONS: ⋆ WASD to move ⋆ Click to mine ⋆ E to interact with the Shop Keeper + close the shop ⋆ Mouse scroll wheel to select items in your hotbar or click on the slot to select them ⋆ Mouse scroll wheel scroll in the shop ⋆ Space to place tiles ⋆ Click on the item's icons to sell them while in the shop ⋆ Better ores sell for more money but they spawn deeper and deeper in the world ⋆ Use ladders to get up and down your mine shafts ==============================================

 ✦ PRO TIP: Don't eat dirt  :D
